name: Restoring Falmay
storyline: World of Vyen, Year 54 A.R. (Arcane Renaissance). In the mystical fairy kingdom of Falmay, a dark corruption has begun to spread, threatening the nature and beauty that has sustained the land for centuries. Claire, a young and courageous fairy priestess, feels the call to protect her home. She embarks on a perilous journey to cleanse Falmay of this vile force. Claire and her friends must restore the kingdom to its former glory before the corruption consumes everything they hold dear. Will they be able to save Falmay, or will the kingdom fall into darkness forever?
summary: An RPG about saving a fairy's homeland.
